hero.p:
My mission is to create engaging and intuitive digital experiences that capture attention and provide tangible value. With a blend of creativity and technical expertise, I transform ideas into extraordinary projects.

Learn more about me and my work by browsing this portfolio.

description.firstP:
Hello, I'm Emiliano Scanga, a 28-year-old front-end developer living in Como (IT).
I've been a passionate web page and application creator since I was twelve years old. It all began during my school days when I had an experience with Microsoft Front Page and Dreamweaver, leading me to create my first landing page. Since then, my passion has steadily grown, driving me to independently deepen my knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
description.secondP: In 2023, my dedication to web development led me to make a significant decision: I chose to pursue a professional path as a Full Stack Web Developer with Develhope. This decision was fueled by my desire to expand my skills and gain a deeper perspective in the field of web development.
description.thirdP: I'm thrilled to put my skills and knowledge into practice, making the most of opportunities to grow as a professional in the industry.
description.fourthP: Here are a few technologies I've been working with:

mockup.title: Mockup creation with Figma
mockup.description: Designing and crafting interactive mockups that bring your ideas to life. From concept to visualization, I specialize in creating engaging mockups that pave the way for seamless development.

development.title: Landing page design and development
development.description: Crafting visually stunning and highly functional landing pages tailored to your specific goals. I focus on creating a captivating user experience to drive engagement and conversions.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce development with WordPress
ecommerce.description: Building and customizing feature-rich e-commerce websites using WordPress. From product listings to secure payment gateways, I create seamless online shopping experiences.

mobile.title: Mobile App development with Ionic/Angular
mobile.description: Designing and developing cross-platform mobile applications using Ionic and Angular. I specialize in creating efficient and engaging mobile apps for both iOS and Android platforms.

performance.title: Performance optimization
performance.description: Optimizing website performance on PageSpeed Insights platforms. I ensure that your website loads quickly and efficiently, enhancing user satisfaction and search engine rankings.

refactoring.title: Web page refactoring
refactoring.description: Optimizing and restructuring existing web pages to improve code quality, performance, and user experience. Enhancing the efficiency and maintainability of web pages for better overall functionality.

coffe.title: Drink coffee
coffe.description: And last but not least, fueling creativity and productivity with a love for coffee! Because great ideas deserve great coffee.

description.firstP: Thank you for considering my services. If you have a project in mind, a question, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you.
description.secondP: Feel free to reach out using the button and social media below, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Designed & built by Emiliano Scanga with
